summary:
Craft, Improve & Enchant a Spectral Bow & Spectral Arrows for it! (MISC)
Does not replace any Bow!
Working Inventory image!
Arrows fire faster/recoverable/glow/better penetration
White version available
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][size=3]Craft, Improve and Enchant a Spectral Bow & Arrows for it! (MISC) [/size]
[size=3]Now with added Skills to Perks. [/size]

[color=#ffff00]************************************************************ [/color]
[b][color=#00ff00]Does not replace any Bow![/color]
[color=#00ff00]Working Inventory image![/color]
[color=#00ff00]Arrows fire faster/recoverable/glow/[/color]better penetration
White[color=#00ff00] version available[/color]
[/b]
[color=#ffff00]************************************************************ [/color]
[i]The following additional skills applies to all bows, not just Spectral.[/i]

[b][u]3 additional upgrade skills to Sneak and Archery [/u][color=#ffff00]***[/color][/b]

[color=#00ffff][b]Archery:[/b][b] [/b][/color]
[size=3]Critical Shot -(4/4) 25% chance of a critical hit that does 50% more critical damage. [/size]
[size=3]Bullseye -(3/3) 35% chance of paralysing the target for even longer. [/size]
[b]
[color=#00ffff]Sneak:[/color][/b][b] [/b]
[size=3]Deadly Aim -(2/2) Sneak attacks with bows now do 4 times damage. [/size]
[color=#ffff00]************************************************************[/color]

[b][color=#ff0000]Requirements:[/color][/b]

[size=3]Arcane Blacksmith, Advanced Armors & Daedric Smithing [/size]
[color=#ffff00]***********************************************************************************[/color][size=3] [/size]
[b][color=#00ffff]Recipe Spectral Bow:[/color][/b]
[size=3]x5 Glow Dust [/size]
[size=3]x1 Daedra Heart [/size]
[size=3]x3 Ebony Ingot [/size]
[b]
[color=#00ffff]Improve bow:[/color][/b]
[size=3]x1 Ebony Ingot [/size]
[size=3]x1 Glow Dust [/size]
[b]
[color=#00ffff]Recipe Spectral Arrows (x100) (Arrows can be recovered)[/color][/b]
[size=3]x5 Firewood [/size]
[size=3]x5 Glow dust [/size]
[size=3]x25 Daedric Arrows[/size]

[color=#ffff00]********************************************************************************** [/color]
[u][b]
[color=#ff0000]Bound Bow/Mystic Bow Vs Spectral Bow Stats:[/color][/b][/u][color=#ff0000] (updated 17/02/2013) [/color]
[b]
[color=#00ffff]Dmg: [/color][/b]
[size=3]Bound Bow - 18 [/size]
[size=3]Mystic - 24 [/size]
[size=3]Spectral - 20 [/size]

[color=#00ffff][b]Weight:[/b] [/color]
[size=3]Bound Bow - 0 [/size]
[size=3]Spectral - 5 [/size]
[size=3]Mystic - 0 [/size]

[b][color=#00ffff]Crit Dmg:[/color] [/b]
[size=3]Bound Bow - 9 [/size]
[size=3]Spectral - 10 [/size]
[size=3]Mystic - 12 [/size]

[b][color=#00ffff]Dmg Arrow:[/color] [/b]
[size=3]Bound Arrow - 24 [/size]
[size=3]Spectral Arrow - 28 [/size]
[size=3]Mystic - 24 [/size]

[b][color=#00ffff]Impact Dmg:[/color][/b][size=3] [/size]
[size=3]Bound Arrow 1.50 [/size]
[size=3]Spectral Arrow 1.65[/size]
[size=3]Mystic - 1.50[/size]

[color=#ffff00]********************************************************************************* [/color]
[b]
[size=2][color=#ff0000]My Personal Settings for Archery/Xbow:
[/color]Found in Skyrim.ini

[color=#999999] [Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=12288.0000

[Combat]
fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f1PBoltTiltUpAngle=0.7 
f3PBoltTiltUpAngle=0.7
[/color]


[color=#ffff00]********************************************************************************************[/color]
If you just want the bow to 'test', type help spectral in console[/size]


[size=3]Known Bugs: [/size][/b]
[size=3]-None at present.[/size]


[/font][color=#ffff00]***[/color]- Applies to bows with the added perks.
author: HyPNOS
